item.title: Best of 地铁音MAD
item.description: What is Bilibili? Bilibili is a video-sharing website known for bullet comments, live comments that play over videos in real time (more: What is Bilibili?). What is 音MAD? 音MAD (pronounced: yin mad, literally “sound MAD”) is a category of video where a song and some audio source are remixed together. 地铁音MAD (pronounced: di tie yin mad, literally: “subway sound MAD”) is a subset of 音MAD videos that remixes the sounds of public transportation with popular songs for an interesting result.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello world! Welcome to my internet home.
